channel.title: Need help on finding a good starting place
channel.description:
Alright, soon I'm going to start coding a new server, which I hope it to be popular.
My experience with Java isn't great, but it's average. I know the basics, and little of the hard stuff.
All I want is a good place to base my server. I don't want to use somewhere that is already used...
Okay, so I want to gather some infomation on where people would like the server to be based around. It would be good if you gave me the COORDS too.
After that I'm going to request a lock and add a Poll to my recuritment topic after the poll is finished and I have enough people, work will start.
So please post where you'd like the server to be based.
[size=15pt]I ALSO NEED A GOOD FORUM BASE![/size]
Regards, x0 0wn.

item.title: Need help on finding a good starting place

use waterbirth
